author: Special Correspondent
text:
Election officials receiving calls at the Control Room and Call Centre in Tiruchi on Friday.— PHOTO: B. VELANKANNI RAJ

As many as 18 election-related complaints have been received at the call centre set up at the Collector’s office here so far.

The complaints received at this call centre will be immediately recorded and informed the authorities concerned, including the flying squad. The call centre will function round-the-clock and the personnel would work on three shifts daily.

Those in need of lodging complaints can contact by calling 0431-2419105, 2419505, 2410405, 2410605, or 2414725.
title: Call centre goes on stream
